metadata.title: CVE-2023-26768 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Liblouis v.3.24.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the compileTranslationTable.c and lou_setDataPath functions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26768` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.22.0-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 3.22.0-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis20 - 3.22.0-2ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 3.22.0-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-2ubuntu0.1').
